original_text: These are the families of the sons of Asher according to those that were numbered of them; who were fifty and three thousand and four hundred.
korean_text: 이는 아셀 자손의 종족들이니 계수된 자가 오만 삼천사백 명이었더라

sentences.original_text: These are families of sons of Asher
according to those that were numbered of them
sentences.korean_translation: 그들 중에서 계수된 자들에 따른 것이며

sentences.original_text: who were fifty and three thousand and four hundred
